an5.209:1.1: “Pancime, bhikkhave, adinava ayatakena gitassarena dhammam bhanantassa.
an5.209:1.3: Attanapi tasmim sare sarajjati, parepi tasmim sare sarajjanti, gahapatikapi ujjhayanti:
an5.209:1.4: ‘yatheva mayam gayama, evamevam kho samana sakyaputtiya gayanti’ti, sarakuttimpi nikamayamanassa samadhissa bhango hoti, pacchima janata ditthanugatim apajjati.
an5.209:1.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca adinava ayatakena gitassarena dhammam bhanantassa”ti.
